EmailTemplate.name: BI-NA RoofLiner
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont RoofLiner™ Sample Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont RoofLiner™. The sample requested has been sent under separate cover. This lightweight, easy-to-use synthetic, premium roofing underlayment provides excellent protection against leaks under all types of roof coverings identified by ICC-ES AC48, Section 3.0. It is trusted protection that can give greater peace of mind. Additionally, DuPont RoofLiner™ offers Class A fire rating, superior tear and UV resistance along with better water hold-out and more resistance to mold growth than traditional roofing felt.
DuPont Weatherization Systems are an integrated family of products that work together to provide superior protection of the building envelope, In addition to RoofLiner™, DuPont also offers:
Specialized Wraps
o Tyvek® HomeWrap® o Tyvek® DrainWrap™ o Tyvek® StuccoWrap™ o Tyvek® ThermaWrap™
Flashing Products
o 100% butyl backed, self- adhered and easy to use
Tyvek® Tape and Fasteners
For more than 200 years, DuPont has been committed to developing solutions essential to a better, safer, healthier life for people everywhere. We continue to create products designed to help reduce the use of energy, water and materials.
If you need additional information, please visit our website, Weatherization.Tyvek.com, to locate a Tyvek® Specialist in your area.
Thank you for your interest in DuPont Weatherization Systems.
Deborah Pyle Tyvek® Marketing Consultant
